title: LF Ad To Duo With!
body: Hey! I am looking for an AD to duo with! Main support, especially Janna, but can also play leona, Morgana, soraka etc. Thanks and shoot me an add! :)

replies.body: It is best not to try and find a adc duo when you main support. You really need to be able to control the entire map, not just stomp botlane. Try duo with a top/jg main for better climbing.
